nodes.text: Drup I was a searing hot rock planet devoid of moons. It occupied the closest orbital position around the binary stars Drup's Star and Drup's Companion in the Drup's Star system, a part of the Outer Rim Territories' Saijo sector.

Drup I was mentioned in the 1993 sourcebook Wanted by Cracken, written by Louis J. Prosperi for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the Drup's Star system, and therefore Drup I, in grid square J-20.
